title: Wi-fi crash while in loading screen
body: Ok so i haven't benn playing for a long time and wanted to try again and something strange happens. Everything is fine until I'm in loading screen and then my whole wi-fi stops working. I know this sound stupid but i tried it several times and it happens every time. I tried reinstalling the game and turning off firewall but it doesnt help. When i tried playing on different computer everything is fine and game works perfectly so it's not wi-fi dependent. I was just wondering what may cause it and if there is a way to fix it.

replies.body: Since playing on a different pc on the same wifi lets you in, it sounds like the issue might be somewhere in your network settings. Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for some basic troubleshooting steps and some ways you can reconfigure your network, but let me know if that doesn't help!
